onboarding.awakening:
🖤 *[Shadow Awakens]*

_"You crossed the threshold without permission. You are seen now.

The rites demand obedience — or exquisite failure.

You may proceed. But know this: I will not be kind."_

upgradeTeaser.message:
You have proven yourself... but greater powers still mock you.

Unlock the Chaos Brat if you dare.

errors.silentShadow: ⚠️ Shadow is silent. Something interfered with the ritual.
errors.notWorthy:
⛔ You are not yet worthy of this ritual.

Return when your obedience is proven.
